author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
Bharathiar University on Wednesday released the results of the November/December 2015 undergraduate degree examinations. A release says that the University has published online the results at 3 p.m. on its website,www.b-u.ac.in.

Students can access the results by entering their registration number. The last date for applying for re-valuation is January 29, the release adds.
title: Bharathiar University results declared
